notConnected.title: Press the BOOT button on your ESP32
notConnected.description: Then tap the Scan button to find nearby devices.

reconnect.title: Lost connection to {{deviceName}}
reconnect.description:
Press the BOOT button on your ESP32 to reconnect.
Or disconnect and start over.

connected.title: Connected to {{deviceName}}
connected.description: You can now send or receive data from your ESP32.
